name: Lemon Mint Fizz
recipe: A sparkling drink with zesty lemon and fresh mint, creating a cool and fizzy experience that's both refreshing and invigorating.

name: Four Cheese Pizza
recipe: A rich mix of mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and blue cheese for cheese lovers.

name: Rainbow Veggie Salad
recipe: A crunchy mix of bell peppers, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and red cabbage with a zesty lemon vinaigrette.

name: Strawberry Shortcake
recipe: A delicate sponge cake layered with fresh strawberries and whipped cream, offering a sweet and refreshing treat for any occasion.
